## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                             | Type                  | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | --------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Sets the size of the EcoStruxure icon.  The default setting is `small`. | `"medium" \| "small"` | `"small"` |
